creator: eb_mailinglist@yahoo.com
text:
Doesn't like to work when posting "Multipart/form-data" to JSP using ajp12 or 
ajp13 under Tomcat 3.2.1.  Using servlet it's work, but using JSP not. 
Very strange.


(uriworkermap.properties)
/project/*.jsp=ajp12  (JSP context)
/servlet/*=ajp12  (Servlet context)

Thanks.

Please Try latest and greatest Tomcat 3.2.3 if you continue seeing a erroneus 
behavior we can reopen it..
creator: nacho@apache.org
